net.myorb.math.expressions.gui

Class DisplayEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.math.expressions.gui.DisplayEnvironment

  • public class DisplayEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    split components display symbols, stored data, functions, and scripts. capture positions of components within GUI display so refresh rebuilds correctly
    Author:
    Michael Druckman
